column5: A nice one bedroom condominium. Just two minutes walk to the beach. Restaurants, cafe and other dining places are available in the area within a short walk.  We offer a great deal for you to have an enjoyable weekend. Our amenities are; a kitchen with a refrigerator, stove, utensils, dishes, ice, microwave, A/C, wi-fi internet, TV(Amazon Fire stick), drinking water and soda. It is designed for two people, but we can add an extra bed on request.
column8: Two Minutes Walk To The Beach
